version_description: Fixed some bugs!

- Add Vietnamese curriculum
- Add more sticker sets
- Fixed many other bugs
- Improved the performance dramatically
WARNING to existing users: your downloaded courses will be removed and you will have to re-download them but your stickers are still there
Fix bug that app quits unexpectedly in auto mode for iOS 9.x
- Crash and bug fixes
Fixed bugs

- Added more languages. Now children can learn English, Chinese, Spanish, French and Vietnamese.
- Improved the performance and user experience.

- Added more languages. Now children can learn English, Chinese, Spanish, French and Vietnamese.
- Improved the performance and user experience.
Fixed errors for Vietnamese (South).

- New language added: Russian
- More lessons in Chinese, Spanish, French, and Vietnamese
- Phonics part added into topic-based category
- More interesting games for learning phonics and sight words
- Allow users to save stickers when reinstalling the app.
- Optimize user interface

Enable users to create accounts and sign in with Facebook, Gmail or their phone number.
Allow parents to create and manage multiple children's profiles in their account. Each profile has some basic information such as the child's name, age and gender
Synchronize the children's learning progress on different devices under the same account
Personalise each child's experience based on their age and gender
